title: 3 Pyramid Tripeaks 2
description: 3 Pyramid Tripeaks 2 is a solitaire card game that is decorated with the majestic pyramids and history of Egypt. Enjoy the royal scenery of pyramids in your very own oasis while you play a pyramid-inspired online game. For those of you who are fans of solitaire games, this is a different challenge that might enjoy. While this is a casual game, each game is timed to create more of a challenge. There are multiple levels for you to tackle and win. If you run out of the moves, the game will automatically end. If you lose either because of limited moves or time, you must start over with level 1. Submit your score and see if you are good enough to land on the High Scores list with other online card players.
controls: To play this card game, remove all the cards by selecting free cards that are 1 higher or 1 lower than the open card. You can play either a King or a 2 on an Ace. If you choose a card that does not work, you lose points. The card with the beetle icon can be used with any card but you only get one per game. Use it wisely!
